inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: An optional category ID to further filter down to groups in a particular category

inputFields.name: frozenOnly
inputFields.description: Whether to look for groups with FROZEN status only

inputFields.name: groupJoinMode
inputFields.description: Who can join this group and how. One of "approval", "closed", or "open"

inputFields.name: hasJoinQuestions
inputFields.description: If the group has join questions

inputFields.name: indexAlias
inputFields.description: ElasticSearch index or alias to query

inputFields.name: lat
inputFields.description: The latitude of the centroid around which we want to show Groups

inputFields.name: lon
inputFields.description: The longitude of the centroid around which we want to show Groups

inputFields.name: radius
inputFields.description:
A radius to filter groups outside the provided lat/lon. Default = 50 miles.
New-group search defaults to 3000 miles.

inputFields.name: requiresPhotoToJoin
inputFields.description: If the group requires a photo to join

inputFields.name: topicCategoryId
inputFields.description:
An optional topicCategoryID [from topic taxonomy] to further filter down to Groups in a particular category only.
Used if categoryId is empty.

inputFields.name: topicsList
inputFields.description: A list of topic ids which are used to filter for groups
